content:
Here is a current cadence used for sales after I send the following Linkedin Connect request, but they do NOT accept:

"Hi {{first\_name}}, We just wrapped up a big 2+ year project with Spire, helping them scale their tech and sales team through their IPO in the US and Europe. I see you're hiring and I have ideas to streamline your own hiring. I wanted to connect."

Cadence / Email Outreach:

Email 1: We help Spacetech startups hire 

Hi {{first\_name}},
I hope this email finds you well. I had sent you a LinkedIn connection request to introduce myself.
My team just wrapped up a big project with Spire, a Spacetech start-up. As a co-founder, I understand that one of the biggest challenges we face is finding the right people to grow our start-ups, and in Spacetech that can be tough. 
I see you're hiring and I have ideas to streamline your recruiting, if you are up to a chat. 

Let me introduce you to RecruitrLabs, a talent acquisition partner for startups that need to scale quickly. Designed to function as an internal resource to your team, our unique approach takes away the time-consuming portion of recruiting, helping Spacetech startups like yours scale their hiring.
In fact, we understand the unique challenges that Spacetech startups face in finding the right talent to help them grow. We filled some tough roles at Spire, and our team has successfully recruited a wide range of Spacetech roles across Europe, the US, and AIPAC.
I would love to set up a quick call to discuss how we can help your company meet your hiring deadlines. Are you available for a call next week? (Feel free to select a day and time on my Calendar)
Best,

Jonathan
---

EMAIL 2: Talent Acquisition for {{company\_natural}}

Hi {{first\_name}},

I hope you're doing well. I am following up on my LinkedIn invite to connect and my last email, introducing myself. 
Like I said, we completed a big project with Spire where we sourced 23,000 candidates across 60 roles in Europe, the US, Singapore and Australia. This success is being created into a case study, which once completed I will be happy to share.

As a startup in the Spacetech industry, I am sure you're no stranger to the fierce competition for talent, and the challenges that come with some of the more technical roles unique to your space (no pun intended). I also know that in some cases hiring can have tight deadlines, and mean the difference between on time deployment or missed targets.


If you are open to an intro call, let me know when works for you this week or next. (Here is my Calendar)

Here is my LinkedIn to connect - Check out my profile to see who I am. 

Best regards,

Jonathan
---

EMAIL 3: 🚀 Boost Your Hiring Success

Hi {{first\_name}},
I wanted to follow up on my email and share more about how RecruitrLabs can help you build the team you need at {{company\_natural}}.
Our unique approach provides you with two flexible solutions: SOURCE, a subscription-based sourcing-as-a-service, and PRO, our embedded recruiter on-demand solution. With our embedded approach, we can work alongside you and your team as an in-house partner to help you meet your hiring deadlines.
Our data-driven approach allows for smarter decision-making and alignment with the goals of founders and their hiring managers. Additionally, we have access to over 1 billion indexed profiles and have curated over 550,000 unique profiles, ensuring we can find the perfect candidates for your open roles.

So {{first\_name}}, whether you are looking to expand your recruitment reach, fill some critical roles that are impacting deployment deadlines or build a scalable customized recruiting team for {{company\_natural}}, we are the ideal partner to make this happen. 
Let's connect and discuss your hiring needs in more detail. Please feel free to schedule a intro meeting on my calendar at your convenience.


Best,

Jonathan
---

EMAIL 4: Hi {{first\_name}}, Your team access

Hi {{first\_name}},
I wanted to follow up on my previous email and share more about how RecruitrLabs can help you build the team you need at {{company\_natural}}. 


Our solutions include:
SOURCE, a subscription-based sourcing-as-a-service that helps to boost your team's talent sourcing reach
PRO, our embedded recruiter on-demand solution that gets a recruitment team onboard when you need it for as long as you need it

Our clients have seen:
A 30% increase in qualified candidate pipelines
A 50% reduction in time-to-hire

We work as an in-house partner alongside you and your team to help you meet your hiring deadlines. Our solutions give your team access to:
Flexible and scalable resources that adapt to your hiring needs and workflow
A data-driven approach that enables smarter decision-making and aligns with your goals

With access to over 1 billion indexed profiles and having curated over 550,000 unique profiles, we have the resources to help you find the perfect candidates for your open roles.


Let's schedule a call to discuss your hiring needs in more detail and see how we can help your hiring managers meet their hiring deadlines. Select a day and time on my Calendar  to chat.


Best,
Jonathan
---

EMAIL 5: Quick question

Hi {{first\_name}},
Are you still struggling to fill those critical roles? Our clients have seen a 30% increase in candidate pipeline and a 50% reduction in time-to-hire with our support.
We have worked with over 600 clients and completed over 2700 projects to date, and we have ideas to streamline your recruiting too.
Let's schedule a call to discuss in more detail and see how we can help your team meet their hiring deadlines. Here is my Calendar link to book a call at your convenience.


Also, here is my LinkedIn to check to see who I am and connect.

Best,
Jonathan
---
